postings.body:
The Ocean Cliff house in Moclips sits on a magnificent site overlooking the Pacific Ocean and wide sands of Sunset Beach. Enjoy the view from the deck at the cliff`s edge, two decks on the upper storey of the house, or inside through the large picture windows running the length of the house on both storeys. The beautifully landscaped, cliffside backyard features a stone firepit with seating built-in - a wonderful spot for families to gather in the evenings to enjoy the fire and sunset. The house sits on two forested acres with beautiful windswept trees on the cliff`s edge and giant spruce trees on the sheltered side of the grounds.
The beach can be reached by a nearby stairway (10 minute walk) or a walk or drive down the paved Analyde Gap Road, where you can park or drive on the beach (no special vehicle needed - the hard-packed sand drives like asphalt). Going down one way and back up the other makes for a great, energetic walk.
This is a 5 bedroom, 2600 square foot house. The two floors may be rented separately. Both units feature a fully-equipped kitchen, master suite with king size bed and ocean view, deluxe bathrooms, a gas fireplace, and a beautiful interior finish with marble and tile. The 3 bedroom upper level sleeps up to eight and gives access onto the two decks. The 2 bedroom lower level sleeps up to six - it has a larger common area and gives immediate access to the oceanside backyard.
Sorry, no pets.
http://www.MoclipsCliffHouse.com

Have a Cultural Exchange by Living with a Host Family.
We specialize in placing international students that attend our local community colleges and universities with American host families. Enrich your life and live with a host. We offer a variety of products depending on accommodation, meal plan and location. All kinds of American families are available which includes singles, retirees, single parent with children, traditional family and more. We welcome diversity with our hosts. Our hosts live within 45 minutes to a college or university, or high school, apply today!

postings.body:
Summer is here, and it`s time to finally enjoy the beach and the wonderful warm summer weather! Private bedrooms and bath are available in home for weekend rentals. Labor Day weekend (three night minimum) and September weekends are now available!
The house is a comfortable, 3 bedroom single family home with two private baths, an out door shower, kitchen, a living room, large sun room and laundry. The first guest bedroom is furnished with a queen size bed, side tables, closet, cable TV, wireless internet connection and ceiling fan. The room is for one or two adults. The bedroom has its own private bathroom. Directly across from this bedroom is a second guest bedroom. This room is perfect for another adult couple you are travelling with or older children. This room shares the same bathroom as the first bedroom and is available at an additional cost. The second bedroom has two twin beds, night stand, closet, cable TV wireless internet, and ceiling fan. Again, the second bedroom is for one adult or couple who will share the bathroom with the first bedroom for a maximum of four adults.
The home is located off Rt. 1, ocean side, not far from the Giant, the outlets and bike trail. Easy access to downtown Rehoboth or Lewes. The home is shared with male owner who has his own bedroom and bathroom on the other side of house. Gay friendly. No smoking in house, no drugs, and I`m sorry, I do not take pets. Room is available through the fall also.
This is for weekend rentals only -- Friday and Saturday nights, with checkout Sunday morning. Rent is $150/night/room or one room for $300/weekend; both rooms are $600/weekend. There is a two night minimum. Labor Day weekend (August 29, 30 and 31) is $175/night/room with a three night minimum.
Labor Day weekend, August 29, 30, and 31, and all weekends in September are still available.
Due to an increased amount of spam, and online phishing to craigslist ads, when you respond to this ad, please include your email address so I know the response is from a real person and I could respond to your email. Thank you.

postings.body:
Ski In/Out ground-level location close to the Snowflake Lift and 2.5 Blocks from Main Street Breckenridge. This well-constructed, beautiful studio loft condo will be perfect in accommodating all of your Breckenridge vacation needs.
Comfortable and elegant accommodations are ideal for families with 2 children or two couples looking for great mountain access.
Charming and renovated studio condo with loft bedroom located on Four O`clock Road. The Snowflake lift is 200 yards from this condo`s front door, and an exit from the Four O`Clock ski run is only 50 feet from this condo`s front door. This condo has a lockable ski box for all of your skiing equipment and comes with its own heated garage parking. This condo also offers exclusive access to heated swimming pools and hot tubs at the New Upper Village pool facility.
This is an updated studio loft condo with great mountain views, the main level is 377 square feet and the loft bedroom is 140 square feet.
Customized queen murphy bed on main floor, and loft bedroom with a queen bed to easily sleep four people, along with a new 37` flat-screen wall televisions installed on each floor of the condo, perfect for unwinding after a day of hiking or skiing. The wall television on the main floor comes equipped with cable and Chromecast, so you can stream movies online or watch Netflix. The wall television in the loft is set up with a DVD player to accommodate all of your movie needs. Downstairs in the living room, there is a gorgeous fireplace with wood inlay. Full kitchen with everything needed for cooking, complete with dishwasher, microwave, and oven and breakfast bar seating. Main Street Breckenridge, with a variety of restaurants, is only 2.5 blocks away as well. Renovated bathroom with a large walk-in shower, pedestal sink, flexible showerhead, and high ceiling. Common laundry room downstairs with two pay washer and dryers.
The heated community swimming pool with 3 hot tubs at the New Upper Village is only a three minute walk from condo. Complete changing facilities with lockers at pool area. Summer/Winter hours open till 9PM. There is also a climbing playground complete with slides next to the New Upper Village pool facility, which is great for children to play on.
For more information, you can visit VRBO (http://www.vrbo.com/608593).

I have a 2 bay automotive garage that will be available July 1st. It is equipped with 2 lifts and air compressor. This is perfect for someone trying to start up their own business or simply someone looking to restore their own
We are a used car dealership so you will be getting some of the work our vehicles need. However there is another auto repair shop right next door so you must be comfortable in your own abilities to gain your own customers.
Rent would be $2,000/month and first/last required before move in. We are looking for someone who is responsible and definitely no partying/hanging out with your friends as this is a place of business. We have tenants that live upstairs so we must all get along respectfully.
If you are interested email me with a contact number and we can setup a time where you can come look at the place.
